snippet: The University of North Dakota formally dropped its contentious Fighting Sioux nickname after state residents voted, 67 percent to 33 percent, to eliminate it.
abstract: University of North Dakota formally drops its contentious Fighting Sioux nickname after state residents vote, 67 percent to 33 percent, to eliminate it; other college athletics items noted.
lead_paragraph: The University of North Dakota formally dropped its contentious Fighting Sioux nickname after state residents voted, 67 percent to 33 percent, to eliminate it.
